translations.translation: The Companions of the Thicket denied the Messengers,
The people of the Wood too called the messengers liars.
The people of Aykah also gave the lie to the Messengers.
The dwellers of the forest also rejected the Messengers.
The People of the Woods denied the Noble Messengers.
The companions of Al-Aykah denied the Messengers.
The dwellers of the thicket gave the lie to the apostles.
The men of the Thicket cried lies to the Envoys
The dwellers in the wood (of Midian) denied the messengers (of Allah),
The dwellers of the forest also rejected the messengers.
The dwellers of the wood belied the sent ones.
The inhabitants of Aykah impugned the apostles,
The Companions of the Wood rejected the messengers.
The dwellers of Al-Aiyka [near Madyan (Midian)] belied the Messengers.
The dwellers of the Thicket belied their Messengers.
The People of the Woods disbelieved the messengers.
The companions of the thicket denied the messengers
[26:176] The dwellers in the wood (a variant reading [for ashābu’l-aykati] has ashābu laykata), a thicket of trees near Midian, denied the messengers,
(The dwellers in the wood (of Midian) denied the messengers (of Allah)) the people of Shu'ayb denied Shu'ayb just as they denied all the messengers mentioned to them by Shu'ayb,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { كَذَّبَ أَصْحَابُ لْئَيْكَةِ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ } معناه الغَيْضَةُ

translations.translation: And the saying of Allah, {Those who reject the messengers of Lai'ta} means disbelief.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: ثمَّ قال سبجانه: { كَذَّبَ أَصْحَابُ لْئَيْكَةِ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ } [الشعراء: 176]

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
يقول الحق جل جلاله: { كَذَّبَ أَصْحَابُ الأَيْكَةِ الْمُرْسَلِينَ } وهي: الغيضة التي تنبت الشجر
 والمراد بها: غيضة بقرب مدين
 يسكنها طائفة منهم
 وكانوا ممن بعث إليهم شعيب عليه السلام
 وكان أجنبياً منهم
